Steps.Message: Update at 07:28 - Sorry the power is still off this morning. We are are liaising closely with our staff on the ground and our control room to get information for you and currently we are now estimating to have the power back on between 11:30 and 12:30.  We're sorry for the disruption this power cut will be causing, especially the impact it will be having on the start to your day. If you have any concerns about this please do not hesitate to call us on 08003163105 which is free from landlines and mobiles. We will work to fix the problem as quickly and safely as possible.

We became aware of a power cut at 10:27. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

We're sorry for the disruption this power cut will be causing, especially the impact it will be having on the start to your day. If you have any concerns about this please do not hesitate to call us on 08003163105 which is free from landlines and mobiles. We will work to fix the problem as quickly and safely as possible.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
